Posts.Content: I had my first FEC-t yesterday too, chickened out of the cold cap though. So far, so good, but following the anti sickness drugs  routine and drinking loads. One down...!
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy after double mastectomy

Posts.Content: Hi lovely people! I've got pre chemo checks tomorrow and have no idea what to expect...was getting to the point where I thought I was being brave and am now in bits! Any advice, thoughts, etc would be great
Posts.Title: Pre chemo check

Posts.Content: Just looking at fact sheets... FEC-T ... I try to understand a stage at a time! I think I might be resisting knowledge for the first time in my life! Bit frightened...I'm not a control freak, but suddenly almost all of my life is out of control, and I don't know whether Tamoxifen is responsible, but I'm emotionally all over the place! I'm blaming the hormones!
Posts.Title: Just finding my way around...

Posts.Content: Thanks Sharo. I had no idea what a Picc line was- thanks to you and the Macmillan info, I'm a bit wiser! I know I'm in for a weigh in, blood tests and an ECG...looks like we're pretty much at the same stage
Posts.Title: Pre chemo check

Posts.Content: Thank you all for your support and sharing all those things that are whizzing constantly through our brains at the moment... My pre chemo check was really helpful: weight, down(!) height, no change yet and blood. Then a talk about the FEC bit of the FEC-T, whether I want to try a cold cap- anyone out there had a go? Went through the side effects and then a visit to the treatment room and my first visit will be to reclining chair number 5 on the 10th March.  Sounds so spa like... So there's a few of us here, on the starting blocks love and hugs to all Neet
Posts.Title: Pre chemo check

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply! Done the mastectomy bit, now just waiting on a chemo start date: and in the mean time will go back to work... The plus side is, I have time to cook, sew, read, and plan the garden!
Posts.Title: Just finding my way around...

Posts.Content: So much information to take in! Reassuring to know that the waiting is a common frustration for us all
Posts.Title: Just finding my way around...
